body_html:
Hi luanyunteng, what version of CUDA and NCCL are you using?

Have you tried running other NCCL ops. I'm trying to figure out if only this particular op is affected, or if it's a general problem with you NCCL setup.

body:
Hi luanyunteng, what version of CUDA and NCCL are you using?

Have you tried running other NCCL ops. I'm trying to figure out if only this particular op is affected, or if it's a general problem with you NCCL setup.
